concept.title: Metric Monitoring
concept.shortdesc: This page allows you to define charts that display data based on the metrics and parameters you choose.

section.title: Search
section.p: The search bar allows you to filter the notification methods you want to view.

section.title: Create Chart
section.p: The Create Chart button beside the search bar allows you to create a new data chart.

ol.li: Click the Create Chart button to open a separate window that allows you to configure a new chart.

Select a Chart Type in the drop down. Choices are:
Line
Bar
Stacked Bar
Area
Stacked Area

Select a Chart Size in the drop down. Choices are:
Small
Large

Select a Chart Update Rate in the drop down. Choices are:
1 Minute
5 Minutes
10 Minutes
30 Minutes
1 Hour

Select a Time Range in the drop down. Choices are:
Last 60 Minutes
Last 2 Hours
Last 4 Hours
Last 8 Hours
Last 24 Hours
Last 7 Days
Last 30 Days
Last 90 Days

Select a Statistical Function in the drop down. Choices are:
[ None ]
AVG
SUM
MIN
MAX
COUNT
When done creating the chart, click Create Chart.

section.p: After the chart saves, the Metric Monitoring window refreshes with the new chart data populated in the view.
